features: Kids Broom Set: each package comes with 2 sets of small kids broom and dustpan sets; Available in vibrant blue and red, these mini broom and dustpan sets are sure to excite and attract the kids, and stimulate their interest in learning and using the set

Ideal Size for Kids: the small kids broom measures about 20.5 x 5.9 inches, ideal for small hands, while the dustpan measures about 15.5 x 6.2 x 4.7 inches, proper in size for kids to handle, enhancing their cleaning experience; The lightweight and compact design of the set makes it effortless for children to carry and store after every cleaning

Trustworthy Material: this kids broom set is made from quality PP and nylon materials, bringing durability that ensures the set serves your young one for a prolonged period; The kid brooms and dustpans sets are also sturdy and will not break or fade easily

Versatile Features: the mini broom and dustpan set is an essential tool for cleaning dust and small items; Empower your child with a proactive role in maintaining their own spaces clean, while boosting their sense of responsibility and independence

Wide Range of Applications: this toddler broom and cleaning set makes a thoughtful and convenient choice for cleaning floors, sofas, bedrooms, tables, keyboards, laptops and more, which can add a fun touch to your kid's playtime, and turn everyday chores to an enjoyable learning experience
body.description: Features: Educational and practical: The kids broom and dustpan set not only entertains your children but is also a cute educational tool. It aids in the development of a kid's hand eye coordination and improves their practical abilities. Teaching them the basics of housekeeping at an early age can instill proper cleaning habits. Lovely gifts: This versatile set of kid's broom and dustpan makes a thoughtful gift for your students, kids and family on birthdays or other occasions. Its wide applications include home use, use in kids' playrooms, kindergartens, and more. Specifications: Material: PP and nylonColor: blue and redSize: Broom: about 20.5 x 5.9 inchesDustpan: about 15.5 x 6.2 x 4.7 inchesPackage includes: 2 x Child broom and dustpan setsNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
